Package com.navis.framework.persistence.hibernate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDiagnosticEventManager
    Manager for diagnostic events.
    IHibernateDeleteApi
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    ISessionFactoryPostInitializer
    Register bean implementing this interface in the Roastery to be called right after session factory is ready.
    ISessionManager
    Manager for Hibernate Session.
    ITransactionParmsManager
    Manages handling of transaction parms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSessionFactoryPostInitializer
    Implementors of ISessionFactoryPostInitializer must subclass AbstractSessionFactoryPostInitializer Leave us flexibility to add more methods to ISessionFactoryPostInitializer in the future
    AsyncTemplates
    Utilities to work with persistence templates as callable objects and futures.
    CarinaPersistenceCallback<T>
    Used in conjuction with the PersistenceTemplate.
    DefaultDiagnosticEventManager
    Implementation for production.
    DefaultSessionManager
    Implementation for production.
    DefaultTransactionParmsManager
    Implementation for production.
    PersistenceInterceptor
    Adds session/transaction/message collector to a method Interception can be configured through Spring proxy beans Intercepted methods must have UserContext as the first parameter
    PersistenceTemplate<T>
    Adds session/transaction/message collector to a method via CarinaPersistenceCallback Do not use the HibernateTemplate as the Hibernate session APIs are not directly available.
    PersistenceTemplateInterceptor
    Adds session/transaction/message collector to a method via PersistenceTemplate.
    PersistenceTemplatePropagationRequired<T>
    Only class to support programmatic transaction handling with propagation=REQUIRED.
    PersistenceUtils
    Meant for framework transaction handling code, and diagnostic test code.
    SessionDiagnosticsWriter
    Writes statistical data for big Hibernate sessions.
